ing: 1/2 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1/2 (15 ounce) can navy beans, rinsed and drained
des: "Although it may sound like an odd combination of foods, at least it did to me at first, it is a tasty and hearty salad. You may want to alter the dressing and onion amounts to your taste."
ins: In a medium salad bowl, mix together the mango, black beans, navy beans, onion and cilantro. Toss with the balsamic vinaigrette dressing. Enjoy right away, or chill until serving.
